dct_title_s: A NEW MAP of ye WORLD
dct_description_sm: Issued in his: Geography rectified: or, a Description of the World ... Printed for Robert Morden and Thomas Cockeril ..., London, 1680. Reissued in 1688, 1693 and 1700. Issued in: Atlas Terrestris ... [1700]. Issued in: Geography anatomiz’d / Patrick Gordon, London, 1693. Reissued in 1699, 1700, 1702, 1704, and subsequent editions from 1708-1719.
As in general notes, without page number.
With Pag. 1 (top left). Issued in his: Geography rectified: or, a Description of the World ..., 1700.
With Pages 86 & 87 in cartouche at bottom center. Issued in: Geography anatomiz’d / Patrick Gordon, London, 1704, and later editions up to 1719.
LC 498, Shirley 503 (Plate 361); Map Collector, No. 66 (Spring 1994); Shirley correspondence.

California with a flat north coast and labeled off the west side. America slopes to the east, and Terra Iesso is to the west. Virginia and Carolina are named. Title within a banner strung across the top of the map. Large male cherubs depicting the seasons are in each corner. The cartouche at the bottom center is empty.
